item.title: 10 Feb 2024 00:00
item.description: Sloshing water in your mouth, just before you go to bed, helps trigger cleansing receptors that clean your brain off nightmares. Said nobody wise and scientific. But if my five year old trusts it religiously and does it every night, it’s a lie worth telling. Just like contact lenses help see your bones.
item.content:encoded: Sloshing water in your mouth, just before you go to bed, helps trigger cleansing receptors that clean your brain off nightmares. Said nobody wise and scientific. But if my five year old trusts it religiously and does it every night, it’s a lie worth telling. Just like contact lenses help see your bones.
